metadata.title: CVE-2021-27918 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: encoding/xml in Go before 1.15.9 and 1.16.x before 1.16.1 has an infiniteloop if a custom TokenReader (for xml.NewTokenDecoder) returns EOF in themiddle of an element. This can occur in the Decode, DecodeElement, or Skipmethod.

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
